summary: In 2015, the United States transitioned from a combat mission in Afghanistan to a mission to train and advise Afghan forces. We looked at the United States’s advising efforts and found that they have evolved since 2015. For example: The United States expanded advising to additional regions in Afghanistan U.S. forces began to accompany Afghan forces on certain combat operations To accommodate these changes, planned...
title: Security Force Assistance: U.S. Advising of Afghan National Army Has Expanded since 2015, and the U.S. Army Has Deployed a New Advising Unit
